member.name: M:RegexNodes.Shared.ExtensionMethods.EnforceGrouped(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a non-capturing group if the input string is not wrapped in parentheses.

member.name: M:RegexNodes.Shared.Node.CalculateInputsPos
member.summary: Set the position of each input based on the position of the node

member.name: M:RegexNodes.Shared.Node.GetInputsRecursive
member.summary: Get all of the inputs to the node, including the 'previous' input and the sub-inputs of any InputCollections. InputCollections themselves are not returned.
